comment: One of the most talented in college and most aggressive one while playing cards. Aligarh Zindabad 🫡
name: Prakhar Gautam

comment: Finally you got to know my card tricks. Aise hi patte khelte rahenge. Your kich kich will always be remembered. Tujhe trigger krke bada maza aata h😂. Our random trips and movies are never forgettable. Bs bhoolna mat future me
name: Rounak Jain

comment: The most important person in my BTech journey. So many memories together. Literally puri college life saathme dekhi hai. Bully ko bully karne ka maza hi alag hai. Ab Hyderabad mai maze karna but Poker mai paise mat uda dena. I'll miss you alot. Lots of love!!
name: Sahil Rapartiwar

comment: The juari, the chidanki, the nashedi, the nishachar, the every time nalli aurat and what not.. but still i love your subhu version who says "I don't do that shit" and does just opposite of that. Thanks for being my first ever cheek kiss & the one jiske chhedne me sahi me conscious ho jati hu mai.🫂
name: Riya

comment: Pehle toh pranaam 🙏, Jisne jeene rehne ka tareeka sikhaya, 10 nayi gaaliyan sikhai aur 50 backs se bachaya pr ky faida agr meri liye ek bhi bandi nhi dhundi. Insane poker player (addict) and jo 10 games aur anime suggest kre h woh dekh lena bhay, Ps- yeh GKM-Sehil duo se bacha lena pls 😭
name: Aryan Yadav

comment: "Oye subha...me sab chodh raha hu tu padha dena haan fir pass hone jitna"😂. Literally mummy jese daant daant ke tak tune padhaya hai bhalay raat ke 3 kyu na baje ho. Thanks a lot broo🫂 one of the sharpest person of college aur "bhimas" ki fan😜. Hyd se bhi apne poker ke kisse sunate rehna😁
name: Sarvagya Kanungo

comment:
Meri smartest beti🤓
Single handedly Udupi wale ka business badhana koi inse seekhe😂
Campus ke pehle din ka apna book reading session, teri woh tshirt🌚, tharki gyan discussion, Ghar parivaar aur neend wali baatein sab yaad rhengi. 🫂
I know you don't do this shit but Subbuuuu bherry cute 🥰 😘
name: Bhavya Singh Thakur

comment: Mri kpde vibe prtnr😂,501 m apn 2o hi rehte h bt 607 m apna exam DJ, riyu ko prshan krna, 31st,25th,14th n 7th night, was diff. Apne cse lab songs,terrace,walks,stick figures,animal,gossips,cards,bdmtn,rain walks aur apn 3o vibing sb best tha. COKE-LAYS-MGGI hyd m bnd krngi tra! Hepy Manali Trance!
name: Anushka

comment: Chaalbaazi expert😂😂 Gaming and Books 🤝 ab double gaming aur 20 min waale jokes kispe maarunga😂 Hyd me zyada list mat badha dena, hypothetical scenes bhi zyada over nahi. Good luck for the future✨
name: Govind Kizhakke Mepad

comment: Vo wali walk bohot yaad aayegi jisme tune apne mbbs crush ke baare me bataya tha😂😂😂. Ab Hyderabad me full bkc marenge, mst gaming room banayenge.
name: Kushal Sahastrabuddhe

comment: Sidha sidha likh deta hu varna aligarh ki pistol se goli aayegi direct mere ghar😂. 2nd year mai fsz mai baith k bakchodia maarna + halke fulke and coke supremacy😂🫡🫡 yad rahega hamesha .
name: Harsh Parihar

comment: Hey homewrecker, thanks for giving me the best competition (iykyk) Height bhale 5 foot ki ho but Chawd toh Prakhar se bhi zyada hai. It’s an absolute delight to watch you get over competitive and swear during the games. The perfect competition to chikan:) Hyderabad meh toh rice hi khana padega ab.
name: Shrevesh

comment: Subbu, aur movie and series binge krne the yaar! Tera room pe randomly aajana time pass krne and humara 1-2 ghante insta scroll krna. Vaise chote chote flats mein bade bade jhagde toh hote rehte hai kyu haina? 😂 Thanks for helping me in my very coding journey! Send some % of your bonus my way pls..
name: Sreyashi

comment: 5 footiya height or attitude pure brahmand ka. Smartest girl i met ever but not the wisest ig. Anyways a great person to talk to quarantine ki bakchodi yaad rahegi. Atb for future endeavours 🤙🤙
name: Paras Vyas

comment: Valo customs ke time se house of dragon tak bohot maza aaya bro tere saath. All the best and have fun in Hyderabad. (Wo shirt abhi fek diya hai)
name: Nachiket Salunke

comment: Subha the great jise har chiz ka knowledge h 😂🙌🙌 Bengalore humesha yaad rhega mujhe 🤣daring to h tujhme bhot yr. Bhot maze aaye GKM ko ditch krke Bnlgr trips krne mai🤣but ab to Hyd. jaa rhi h, but no issues Bnglr is not so far. Really enjoyed your company, stay the same facts spitting girl🤣ATB
name: Aryan Gupta
